lead_paragraph: President Rodrigo Duterte said the voice of the Almighty threatened to crash his plane if he didn’t stop swearing.

headline.print_headline: The Lord Said to Duterte: Watch Your Mouth, or Else
headline.main: Philippine President, Rodrigo Duterte, Says God Told Him to Quit Cursing

snippet: President Rodrigo Duterte said the voice of the Almighty threatened to crash his plane if he didn’t stop swearing....
